About the Company: Pioneer Embroideries Ltd. is one of the largest manufacturer-exporter of embroideries, Torchon/Bobbin laces, Raschel laces and other garment accessories. They are also the proud owners of the no.1 retail brand for embroidered clothing `Hakoba`.The product range of the company includes Embroideries,Braided Laces,Knitted and Yarns.The products offerings are patronized by garment exporters, manufacturers and designers for their clientele in US, Europe, Africa, Middle-East & Far-Eastern countries.
